revised_title: Development of Retinal Layers in Chick Embryos
tldr: The study investigates the development of the retina's layers in chick embryos, focusing on the inner wall of the retinal cup and its structural similarities to the embryonic cerebral vesicles. The research describes the formation of the external and internal molecular layers, the role of myelospongium fibres, and the differentiation of rod and cone cells.
